data.title: Rep 1104080752 PDF
data.meta_description: 126017356859-rep-1104080752.pdf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is an affidavit of service filed in the bankruptcy case of Avaya Inc. et al. It details documents that were served via various methods on April 6, 2017 related to the sale of the debtors' networking business. These documents included a notice of sale, stalking horse agreement reference sheet, proposed sale order, bidding procedures order, and notice of amendment to the stalking horse agreement. The affidavit lists the parties that were served and the methods of service, such as first class mail, email, and overnight mail.
